verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

קַ֤ח <WH3947> kach Take אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- אַהֲרֹן֙ <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בָּנָ֣יו <WH1121> ba-Nav and his sons אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> it-To, for וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et הַבְּגָדִ֔ים <WH899> hab-be-ga-Dim, with him and the garments וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> She-men oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֑ה <WH4888> ham-mish-Chah; and the anointing וְאֵ֣ת׀ <WH853> ve-'Et פַּ֣ר <WH6499> par and a bullock הַֽחַטָּ֗את <WH2403> ha-chat-Tat, for the sin offering וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> she-Nei and two הָֽאֵילִ֔ים <WH352> ha-'ei-Lim, rams וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> ve-'Et סַ֥ל <WH5536> sal and a basket הַמַּצּֽוֹת׃ <WH4682> ham-matz-Tzot. of unleavened bread

וְאֵ֥ת <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah thou all the congregation הַקְהֵ֑ל <WH6950> hak-Hel; together אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- at פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach unto the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> vai-Ya-'as did מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> o-To; וַתִּקָּהֵל֙ <WH6950> vat-tik-ka-Hel was gathered together הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah, him and the assembly אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- at פֶּ֖תַח <WH6607> Pe-tach unto the door אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> 'O-hel of the tabernacle מוֹעֵֽד׃ <WH4150> mo-'Ed. of the congregation

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָעֵדָ֑ה <WH5712> ha-'e-Dah; unto the congregation זֶ֣ה <WH2088> zeh This הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> had-da-Var, This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD לַעֲשֽׂוֹת׃ <WH6213> la-'a-Sot. to be done

וַיַּקְרֵ֣ב <WH7126> vai-yak-Rev brought מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בָּנָ֑יו <WH1121> ba-Nav; and his sons וַיִּרְחַ֥ץ <WH7364> vai-yir-Chatz and washed אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam בַּמָּֽיִם׃ <WH4325> bam-Ma-yim. them with water

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten And he put עָלָ֜יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav and אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַכֻּתֹּ֗נֶת <WH3801> hak-kut-To-net, upon him the coat וַיַּחְגֹּ֤ר <WH2296> vai-yach-Gor and girded אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To בָּֽאַבְנֵ֔ט <WH73> ba-'av-Net, him with the girdle וַיַּלְבֵּ֤שׁ <WH3847> vai-yal-Besh and clothed אֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To אֶֽת־ <WH854> 'et- with הַמְּעִ֔יל <WH4598> ham-me-'Il, him with the robe וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten and put עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav and אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאֵפֹ֑ד <WH646> ha-'e-Fod; the ephod וַיַּחְגֹּ֣ר <WH2296> vai-yach-Gor upon him and he girded אֹת֗וֹ <WH853> o-To, בְּחֵ֙שֶׁב֙ <WH2805> be-Che-shev him with the curious girdle הָֽאֵפֹ֔ד <WH646> ha-'e-Fod, of the ephod וַיֶּאְפֹּ֥ד <WH640> vai-ye'-Pod and bound ל֖וֹ lo בּֽוֹ׃ bo.

וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem And he put עָלָ֖יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav and אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַחֹ֑שֶׁן <WH2833> ha-Cho-shen; the breastplate וַיִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> vai-yit-Ten upon him also he put אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- on הַחֹ֔שֶׁן <WH2833> ha-Cho-shen, in the breastplate אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָאוּרִ֖ים <WH224> ha-'u-Rim the Urim וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַתֻּמִּֽים׃ <WH8550> hat-tum-Mim. and the Thummim

וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem And he put אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמִּצְנֶ֖פֶת <WH4701> ham-mitz-Ne-fet the mitre עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <WH7218> ro-Sho; upon his head וַיָּ֨שֶׂם <WH7760> vai-Ya-sem did he put עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- and on הַמִּצְנֶ֜פֶת <WH4701> ham-mitz-Ne-fet also upon the mitre אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about מ֣וּל <WH4136> mul against פָּנָ֗יו <WH6440> pa-Nav, front אֵ֣ת <WH853> 'et צִ֤יץ <WH6731> tzitz plate הַזָּהָב֙ <WH2091> haz-za-Hav the golden נֵ֣זֶר <WH5145> Ne-zer crown הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> hak-Ko-desh, the holy כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. Moses

וַיִּקַּ֤ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach took מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שֶׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> She-men oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <WH4888> ham-mish-Chah, the anointing וַיִּמְשַׁ֥ח <WH4886> vai-yim-Shach and anointed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמִּשְׁכָּ֖ן <WH4908> ham-mish-Kan the tabernacle וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after בּ֑וֹ bo; וַיְקַדֵּ֖שׁ <WH6942> vay-kad-Desh and all that [was] therein and sanctified אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853> 'o-Tam.

וַיַּ֥ז <WH5137> vai-Yaz And he sprinkled מִמֶּ֛נּוּ <WH4480> mi-Men-nu some עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- of הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach thereof upon the altar שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> She-va' seven פְּעָמִ֑ים <WH6471> pe-'a-Mim; times וַיִּמְשַׁ֨ח <WH4886> vai-yim-Shach and anointed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמִּזְבֵּ֜חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach the altar וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- and all כֵּלָ֗יו <WH3627> ke-Lav, and all his vessels וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַכִּיֹּ֛ר <WH3595> hak-ki-Yor both the laver וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et כַּנּ֖וֹ <WH3653> kan-No and his foot לְקַדְּשָֽׁם׃ <WH6942> le-kad-de-Sham. to sanctify

וַיִּצֹק֙ <WH3332> vai-yi-Tzok And he poured מִשֶּׁ֣מֶן <WH8081> mish-She-men oil הַמִּשְׁחָ֔ה <WH4888> ham-mish-Chah, of the anointing עַ֖ל <WH5921> 'al and רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> rosh head אַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron; upon Aaron's וַיִּמְשַׁ֥ח <WH4886> vai-yim-Shach and anointed אֹת֖וֹ <WH853> o-To לְקַדְּשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6942> le-kad-de-Sho. him to sanctify

וַיַּקְרֵ֨ב <WH7126> vai-yak-Rev brought מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei sons אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, Aaron's וַיַּלְבִּשֵׁ֤ם <WH3847> vai-yal-bi-Shem and put כֻּתֳּנֹת֙ <WH3801> kut-to-Not coats וַיַּחְגֹּ֤ר <WH2296> vai-yach-Gor upon them and girded אֹתָם֙ <WH853> 'o-Tam אַבְנֵ֔ט <WH73> 'av-Net, them with girdles וַיַּחֲבֹ֥שׁ <WH2280> vai-ya-cha-Vosh and put לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem מִגְבָּע֑וֹת <WH4021> mig-ba-'ot; bonnets כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh upon them as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. Moses

וַיַּגֵּ֕שׁ <WH5066> vai-yag-Gesh And he brought אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et פַּ֣ר <WH6499> par the bullock הַֽחַטָּ֑את <WH2403> ha-chat-Tat; for the sin offering וַיִּסְמֹ֨ךְ <WH5564> vai-yis-Moch laid אַהֲרֹ֤ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron וּבָנָיו֙ <WH1121> u-va-Nav and his sons אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְדֵיהֶ֔ם <WH3027> ye-dei-Hem, their hands עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> rosh upon the head פַּ֥ר <WH6499> par of the bullock הַֽחַטָּֽאת׃ <WH2403> Ha-chat-Tat. for the sin offering

וַיִּשְׁחָ֗ט <WH7819> vai-yish-Chat, And he slew וַיִּקַּ֨ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach took מֹשֶׁ֤ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh [it] and Moses אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדָּם֙ <WH1818> had-Dam the blood וַ֠יִּתֵּן <WH5414> Vai-yit-ten and put עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on קַרְנ֨וֹת <WH7161> kar-Not [it] upon the horns הַמִּזְבֵּ֤חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach of the altar סָבִיב֙ <WH5439> sa-Viv round about בְּאֶצְבָּע֔וֹ <WH676> be-'etz-ba-'O, with his finger וַיְחַטֵּ֖א <WH2398> vay-chat-Te and purified אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach; the altar וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַדָּ֗ם <WH1818> had-Dam, the blood יָצַק֙ <WH3332> ya-Tzak and poured אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- at יְס֣וֹד <WH3247> ye-Sod at the bottom הַמִּזְבֵּ֔חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach, of the altar וַֽיְקַדְּשֵׁ֖הוּ <WH6942> vay-kad-de-She-hu and sanctified לְכַפֵּ֥ר <WH3722> le-chap-Per it to make reconciliation עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> 'a-Lav. also

וַיִּקַּ֗ח <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach, And he took אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- all הַחֵלֶב֮ <WH2459> ha-che-Lev all the fat אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher after עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- was on הַקֶּרֶב֒ <WH7130> hak-ke-Rev that [was] upon the inwards וְאֵת֙ <WH853> ve-'Et יֹתֶ֣רֶת <WH3508> yo-Te-ret and the caul הַכָּבֵ֔ד <WH3516> hak-ka-Ved, [above] the liver וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et שְׁתֵּ֥י <WH8147> she-Tei and the two הַכְּלָיֹ֖ת <WH3629> hak-ke-la-Yot kidneys וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> ve-'Et חֶלְבְּהֶ֑ן <WH2459> chel-be-Hen; and their fat וַיַּקְטֵ֥ר <WH6999> vai-yak-Ter burned מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh and Moses הַמִּזְבֵּֽחָה׃ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-chah. [it] upon the altar

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַפָּ֤ר <WH6499> hap-Par But the bullock וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et עֹרוֹ֙ <WH5785> o-Ro and his hide וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et בְּשָׂר֣וֹ <WH1320> be-sa-Ro his flesh וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et פִּרְשׁ֔וֹ <WH6569> pir-Sho, and his dung שָׂרַ֣ף <WH8313> sa-Raf he burnt בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> ba-'Esh, with fire מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> mi-Chutz without לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> lam-ma-cha-Neh; the camp כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh as the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh. Moses

וַיַּקְרֵ֕ב <WH7126> vai-yak-Rev And he brought אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et אֵ֣יל <WH352> 'eil the ram הָעֹלָ֑ה <WH5930> ha-'o-Lah; for the burnt offering וַֽיִּסְמְכ֞וּ <WH5564> vai-yis-me-Chu laid אַהֲרֹ֧ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron and Aaron וּבָנָ֛יו <WH1121> u-va-Nav and his sons אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> ye-dei-Hem their hands עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on רֹ֥אשׁ <WH7218> rosh upon the head הָאָֽיִל׃ <WH352> ha-'A-yil. of the ram

וַיִּשְׁחָ֑ט <WH7819> vai-yish-Chat; And he killed וַיִּזְרֹ֨ק <WH2236> vai-yiz-Rok sprinkled מֹשֶׁ֧ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh [it] and Moses אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַדָּ֛ם <WH1818> had-Dam the blood עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on הַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-ach upon the altar סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> sa-Viv. round about

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הָאַ֔יִל <WH352> ha-'A-yil, the ram נִתַּ֖ח <WH5408> nit-Tach And he cut לִנְתָחָ֑יו <WH5409> lin-ta-Chav; into pieces וַיַּקְטֵ֤ר <WH6999> vai-yak-Ter burnt מֹשֶׁה֙ <WH4872> mo-Sheh and Moses אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הָרֹ֔אשׁ <WH7218> ha-Rosh, the head וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַנְּתָחִ֖ים <WH5409> han-ne-ta-Chim and the pieces וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַפָּֽדֶר׃ <WH6309> hap-Pa-der. and the fat

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַקֶּ֥רֶב <WH7130> hak-Ke-rev the inwards וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַכְּרָעַ֖יִם <WH3767> hak-ke-ra-'A-yim and the legs רָחַ֣ץ <WH7364> ra-Chatz And he washed בַּמָּ֑יִם <WH4325> bam-Ma-yim; in water וַיַּקְטֵר֩ <WH6999> vai-yak-Ter burnt מֹשֶׁ֨ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh and Moses אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- the whole הָאַ֜יִל <WH352> ha-'A-yil the whole ram הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חָה <WH4196> ham-miz-Be-chah, upon the altar עֹלָ֨ה <WH5930> 'o-Lah it [was] a burnt sacrifice ה֤וּא <WH1931> hu he לְרֵֽיחַ־ <WH7381> le-rei-ach- savour נִיחֹ֙חַ֙ <WH5207> ni-Cho-ach for a sweet אִשֶּׁ֥ה <WH801> 'ish-Sheh [and] an offering made by fire הוּא֙ <WH1931> hu he לַיהוָ֔ה <WH3069> Yah-weh, God כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> Yah-weh God אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> mo-Sheh.
